entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
